(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Declaration 
      (ClassDeclaration 
        (ClassBody 
          (PublicFieldDefinition 
            (Expression 
              (Number "5")) 
            (PropertyIdentifier "bar")) 
          (MethodDefinition 
            (StatementBlock 
              (Statement 
                (ReturnStatement 
                  (Expression 
                    (Identifier "a"))))) 
            (PropertyIdentifier "one") 
            (FormalParameters 
              (RequiredParameter 
                (Identifier "a")))) 
          (MethodDefinition 
            (StatementBlock 
              (Statement 
                (ReturnStatement 
                  (Expression 
                    (Identifier "b"))))) 
            (PropertyIdentifier "two") 
            (FormalParameters 
              (RequiredParameter 
                (Identifier "b")))) 
          (MethodDefinition 
            (StatementBlock 
              (Statement 
                (ReturnStatement 
                  (Expression 
                    (Identifier "c"))))) 
            (PropertyIdentifier "three") 
            (FormalParameters 
              (RequiredParameter 
                (Identifier "c"))))) 
        (TypeIdentifier "Foo")))))
